title: Policy Task Force I
description: Capstone project in which teams of students formulate, analyze, and recommend policy options.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PUBP 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PUBP 3130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (PUBP 3120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
